title: Print, 1745
medium: Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper
inscribed: On plate, upper right: E; upper center, in the image: Deux diferents desseins de Tables; lower center, in the image: Plan de la Tablette de marbre, qui fait/la Couronement de la Table Sy dessus; center, in the image: Plan de la Tablette de marbre, qui fait/la couronement de la Table Sy dessus; lower left: Inventé par F. de Cuvilliés; lower center: C.P.S.C.M.; lower right: gravé par C.A. de Lespilliez/3
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux (D. 80 and 81)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, 1745.
1745. Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-285-29.
